bookAuthors: Franklin W. Dixon, Walter S. Rogers, Leslie McFarlane
Plot: After a dying criminal confesses that his loot has been stashed "in the tower" the Hardy Boys make an astonishing discovery.
Characters: Frank Hardy, Chet Morton, Iola Morton, Callie Shaw, Phil Cohen, Joe Hardy, Fenton Hardy, Biff Hooper, Ezra Collig, Henry Robinson, Laura Hardy, Oscar Smuff, Jerry Gilroy, Tony Prito, Hurd Applegate, Perry Robinson, Adelia Applegate
